welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Abu Za`bal, Egypt! Get ready to be enchanted by our city's rich history and vibrant culture. We invite you to immerse yourself in our charming streets and discover all that Abu Za`bal is known for. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal for mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal for mainly international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sphinx International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Sphinx International Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
